## StoreMiddleware type

Store的中间件

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type StoreMiddleware = (api: {
    getStore: () => IStore;
    dispatch: Dispatch;
}) => (next: Dispatch) => (action: Action) => void | Promise<void>;
```
<b>References:</b> [IStore](./react-taro.istore.md)<!-- -->, [Dispatch](./react-taro.dispatch.md)<!-- -->, [Action](./react-taro.action.md)

## Remarks

类似于 Redux 的 Middleware
